tasks.label: Git Merge and Push
tasks.command: git checkout main && git merge fix/security-auth-check --no-edit && git push origin main

tasks.label: Git Merge Push Security Fix
tasks.command: git checkout main; git merge fix/security-auth-check --no-edit; git push origin main

tasks.label: Git Commit and Push Lint Fix
tasks.command: git add -A; git commit -m 'fix: remove remaining console.log statements'; git push origin main

tasks.label: Git Update Branch and Push
tasks.command: git checkout fix/security-auth-check; git merge main --no-edit; git push origin fix/security-auth-check

tasks.label: Git Stash Switch Commit Push
tasks.command: git stash; git checkout fix/security-auth-check; git stash pop; git add -A; git commit -m 'fix: remove remaining console.log statements for lint'; git push origin fix/security-auth-check
